abortion

 ∙ If the woman is bleeding and the 
retained products of conception can 
be seen coming out from the vagina, 
remove them with your finger.
 ∙ Start IV fluids.
 ∙ Refer her to the MO of a 24-hour 
PHC/FRU.
 ∙ Put her in touch with local support 
groups.
 ∙ Do NOT carry out a vaginal 
examination under any circumstances.
Bleeding P/V, after 20 weeks 
of gestation 
Check the pulse 
and BP to assess 
for shock.
Antepartum
